profile.name: Sagyam Thapa
profile.title: Cloud & DevOps Engineer
profile.tagline: I build and automate robust, scalable cloud infrastructure.
about: As a backend developer, I specialize in building robust and scalable systems. My experience includes designing database schemas, architecting ERP applications, and deploying high-availability infrastructure. I have a passion for creating self-managed observability stacks with tools like Grafana, Prometheus, and Loki to ensure system health and performance.

I am currently preparing for the Azure and AWS DevOps and Developer Associate exams, as well as the CKS and CKAD certifications to deepen my expertise in cloud-native technologies. I thrive on tackling complex challenges and am always eager to explore new technologies that drive efficiency and resilience.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy collecting books, catching up on my favorite TV series, and hunting for the best coffee in town.

metadata.siteDescription: A personal portfolio showcasing DevOps and Cloud Engineering projects and skills.

experiences.title: DevOps Engineer
experiences.description: Leveraging expertise in AWS, Azure, and Kubernetes to build and maintain scalable cloud solutions. Focusing on data platform optimization with Databricks.

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.description: Led the design and deployment of a high-availability ERP infrastructure, including a self-managed observability stack (Loki, Grafana, Prometheus), a replicated Postgres cluster, and an Nginx API gateway. Implemented a Linkerd service mesh for enhanced security and monitoring.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
experiences.description: Developed a reusable component library and built dynamic, permission-based dashboards for a political survey platform. Created interactive data visualizations with Apache ECharts and refactored the legacy codebase to TypeScript, optimizing state management with React Query.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Developed and deployed the backend for an image annotation platform on AWS. Optimized a high-traffic landing page using Next.js, achieving a page load time under 200ms, and refactored the data annotation dashboard to align with new UI designs.

projects.title: Tools
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of interactive educational tools for learning computer science algorithms, data structures, and system design concepts.

projects.title: InfraWise
projects.description: A financial modeling tool for comparing Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) between cloud and on-premise infrastructure solutions. Make informed infrastructure decisions with detailed cost breakdowns and breakeven analysis.
